page.title: 11Leisure and Recreation, Hoo.
page.content: {The BP Club}offers alot of amenities. There is a swimming pool with 3 diving boards and a spring board. There is a football/rugby pitch and 2 cricket pitches. It has 4 clay tennis courts and 2 table tennis tables. There are disco's every month, and for the old people there are groups which come in and sing. There is{ballroom dancing and there is a bar. There are, tennis, table tennis,{swimming, diving and sub {aqua clubs.}There is a pool table and a 12 foot snooker table. There are also 2 squash courts with 45 minute sessions. Opposite the school is the {Hundred of Hoo Swimming Pool}which is 25 meters by 10 meters. It does not have diving boards. Also present is a table tennis table with half hour sessions. There are also squash courts which have 45 minute sessions. {By Peter Haggie & Andrew Calvert 13yr.
